name: astrometry.net-api-lite
description: A lite API-only version of astrometry.net, to provide solver functionality via an identical API

scripts.all:build: npm run api:build && npm run worker:build && npm run mgr:build && npm run db:create
scripts.api:build: npm run api:clean-dist && npm run common:clean-dist && npm run api:tsoa && npm run api:tsc && npm run api:swagger && npm run api:dashboard && npm run api:copy-conf
scripts.api:develop: npm run api:build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TS,Server,Swagger,Dash" -c "yellow.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold,blue.bold" "npm run api:ts-watcher" "npm run api:server-watcher" "npm run api:swagger-watcher" "npm run api:dashboard-watcher"
scripts.api:tsoa: mkdirp ./dist && mkdirp ./dist/api && tsoa routes && tsoa swagger
scripts.mgr:build: npm run mgr:clean-dist && npm run common:clean-dist && npm run mgr:tsc && npm run mgr:copy-conf
scripts.mgr:develop: npm run mgr:build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TS" -c "yellow.bold" "npm run mgr:tsc-watcher"
scripts.worker:build: npm run worker:clean-dist && npm run common:clean-dist && npm run worker:tsc && npm run worker:copy-conf
scripts.worker:develop: npm run worker:build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TS" -c "yellow.bold" "npm run worker:tsc-watcher"
